data.text: Nia dagi o nia madahaanau o Levi ne hula gi Eleazar, taane hai mee dabu, mo Joshua, tama daane a Nun, mo nia dagi o nia madahaanau o nia madawaawa huogodoo o Israel

i Shiloh, i lodo tenua go Canaan, ga helekai gi digaula, “Dimaadua la gu hagawaalanga mai baahi o Moses bolo goodou gi gaamai gi gimaadou madau waahale e noho ai gimaadou, mo nia gowaa ono geingatolo i golo ala e mee di haangai madau manu.”21.2 Numbers 35.1-8
Gei digau Israel ga daudali nnelekai Dimaadua, gaa wanga gi di madawaawa Levi nadau waahale mo nadau gowaa iai ni geingatolo, mai i lodo nadau gowaa ala ne hai mee ginai ginaadou.

Mai i lodo di madawaawa Levi, ma go nia madahaanau lligi o di madahaanau damana o Kohath ne wanga ginai nadau waahale e noho ai i di matagidagi. Nia madahaanau i di madawaawa Levi ala nia hagadili ni Aaron, tangada hai mee dabu, la ne wanga ginai nia waahale e madangaholu maa dolu i lodo nia gowaa a Judah, Simeon, mo Benjamin.
Digau ala i golo i di madahaanau damana o Kohath ne wanga ginai nia waahale e madangaholu i nia guongo a Ephraim, Dan mo Manasseh i Bahi i Dai.
Di madahaanau damana o Gershon la ne wanga ginai nia waahale e madangaholu maa dolu mai i nia madawaawa Issachar, Asher, Naphtali mo Manasseh i Bahi i Dua.
Nia madahaanau lligi o di madahaanau damana o Merari la ne wanga ginai nia waahale e madangaholu maa lua i nia madawaawa Reuben, Gad mo Zebulun.
Digau Israel guu wanga nia waahale aanei mono gowaa geingatolo gi di madawaawa Levi gi di hai o di hudihudi gi nia hadu, be di hagawaalanga a Dimaadua ne hai ang gi Moses.
Aanei nia ingoo o nia waahale mai i di madawaawa Judah mo Simeon ala ne wanga
gi di hagadili o Aaron dela go di madahaanau o Kohath, dela go di hagadili ni Levi. Go digaula ala e gai i di matagidagi.
Digaula guu wanga ginai di waahale go Arba (Arba la go tamana a Anak), dolomeenei e gahi bolo Hebron, i lodo tenua gonduu o Judah, mo dono gowaa geingatolo.
Malaa, nia gowaa maalama o di waahale deenei, mono dama waahale ala i tua di waahale damana la guu wanga gi Caleb tama daane a Jephunneh e hai mee ginai.
Nia waahale aanei la guu wanga gi di hagadili Aaron, tangada hai mee dabu:
Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juttah, mo Beth Shemesh, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Digaula guu wanga ginai nia waahale e haa mai i di madawaawa Benjamin:
Anathoth mo Almon, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Nia waahale huogodoo mo nadau gowaa geingatolo ala ne wanga gi nia gau hai mee dabu, go di hagadili o Aaron, le e madangaholu maa dolu.
Nia madahaanau lligi ala i golo o di madahaanau damana o Kohath i di madawaawa Levi la guu wanga ginai nia waahale mai i di madawaawa Ephraim.
Nia waahale e haa aanei la guu wanga gi digaula:
Kibzaim, mo Beth Horon, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Nia waahale e haa aanei mai i di madawaawa Dan la guu wanga gi digaula:
Aijalon, mo Gath Rimmon, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Digaula guu wanga ginai nia waahale e lua aanei mai i nia guongo a Manasseh i Bahi i Dai:
Nia waahale huogodoo mo nadau gowaa geingatolo ala guu wanga gi nia madahaanau lligi o di madahaanau damana o Kohath, le e madangaholu.
Di buini i golo i di madawaawa Levi dela go di madahaanau damana o Gershon, la guu wanga ginai nia waahale e lua aanei i nia guongo o Manasseh i Bahi i Dua:
Digaula la guu wanga ginai nia waahale e haa aanei mai i di madawaawa Issachar,
Jarmuth, mo Engannim, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Digaula la guu wanga ginai nia waahale e haa aanei mai i di madawaawa Asher:
Helkath, mo Rehob, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Gei digaula guu wanga ginai nia waahale e dolu aanei mai i di madawaawa Naphtali:
Nia waahale huogodoo mo nadau gowaa geingatolo ala guu wanga gi nia madahaanau lligi o di madahaanau damana o Gershon le e madangaholu maa dolu.
Gei di buini i golo i di madawaawa Levi, dela go di madahaanau damana o Merari, la guu wanga ginai nia waahale e haa aanei mai i di madawaawa Zebulun:
Dimnah mo Nahalal, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Digaula la guu wanga ginai nia waahale e haa aanei mai i di madawaawa Reuben:
Kedemoth mo Mephaath, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Digaula la guu wanga ginai nia waahale e haa aanei mai i di madawaawa Gad,
Heshbon mo Jazer, mo nadau gowaa geingatolo.
Malaa, nia waahale huogodoo ala ne wanga gi di madahaanau damana o Merari le e madangaholu maa lua.
Nia waahale huogodoo e madahaa maa walu mo nadau gowaa geingatolo la guu wanga gi di madawaawa Levi, mai i nia guongo ala ne hai mee ginai digau Israel.
Dimaadua guu wanga gi digau Israel nia gowaa ala ne hagababa ang gi nia maadua mmaadua digaula. Di madagoaa digaula ne hai mee gi nia maa, gei digaula guu noho i golo.

Dimaadua guu wanga gi digaula di aumaalia i lodo tenua hagatau deelaa, be ana helekai ne hai gi nia maadua mmaadua digaula. Di hagadaumee e dahi i nia hagadaumee huogodoo digaula guu mee di hai baahi gi digaula ai, idimaa Dimaadua guu wanga gi digau Israel di aali i nadau hagadaumee huogodoo.
Dimaadua gu haga kila aga nia hagababa huogodoo ala ne hai ang gi digau o Israel.
